content.question: Using the intelligence quotient formula to determine IQ, which of the following individuals would have the highest IQ?

choices.label: Sam, who has a mental age of 5 and a chronological age of 5
Dianne, who has a mental age of 5 and a chronological age of 6
Woody, who has a mental age of 6 and a chronological age of 5
Carla, who has a mental age of 7 and a chronological age of 5

content.answer: Carla, who has a mental age of 7 and a chronological age of 5

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
